text:
e="preserve">Erkan Kandemir (born in 2, September 1981 in Istanbul, Turkey)
is a Turkish politician and architect And a member of the Justice and Development Party in Turkey
Biography.
Erkan is from Rize In Turkey in originally.
and graduated from the Department of Civil Engineering at Sakarya university,
He gets a Master's degree in International Relations and Political Science from Kingston University in England.
In October 2014 he was appointed as Deputy Minister of Health of the Republic of Turkey.
References.
